website_summaries.verdict: Kit includes standard features like microfiber cloths and air blower, plus helpful double-sided lens-cleaning pen for quick touch-ups.
pros: Four microfiber cloths for deep lens cleaning, air blower for tight spaces, and brush for stubborn particles are comparable to other kits
We love the addition of the double-sided cleaning pen
One side includes a non-liquid cleaning element so it doesn't dry out
Other side is hard bristle brush that works nicely for quick touch-ups during photography sessions

customer_reviews.title: Wast of money, gets glue all over your lens.
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews that said there could be glue on the pen. When I got mine I tried to clean it off and thought I had but it still got glue all over my lens. Don’t wast your money on this. My boyfriend also ordered from this company and his had glue on it too. Brush came bent up in package as well. Crappy plastic bag holds all the items when you get it but you’ll probably break it getting it open. It’s just cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic kit
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a nice kit and affordable. The small spray bottle is excellent for using my preferred cleaning solution in remote locations. Good microfiber cloths. Only negative consideration is that the brush is somewhat cheap and the bristles dislodge very easily so I only apply this to the external camera and lens after use in dusty conditions and never on glass or inside the camera body.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning pen is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I regret wasting my time and money. The cleaning pen in particular was bad--the rubber end that is supposed to clean the lens left rubbery residue all over my Nikon wide angle lens which was quite difficult to get off. I have had pens like this before and have never had this issue. The rest of the stuff in the kit could easily be purchased at the dollar store. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JodiM

customer_reviews.title: the go to starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great starter kit for anyone, I used it to get dust off my sensor with the air duster included and it worked flawlessly. The wipes are soft and clean the lenses perfectly and you get quite a few of them. The brush worked well and got into spaces I couldn't other wise get dust from on my lenses. All and all I have no complaints this is an excellent starter kit for anyone. The pouch is resealable and fits in my camera bag so I can take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin A. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: As much as this is a camera cleaning kit, this is also an all-purpose tech/vinyl cleaning kit!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a Panasonic Lumix G7 and noticed I had a spot on the lens. Drove me crazy and was able to fix it with this versatile cleaning kit. The lens cleaning pen with reversible pads is absolutely worth the money in and of itself. The polishing cloths, air bulb thing (which is great for dedusting records), spray bottle and other sundries are absolutely essential for keeping good maintenance for your camera and other tech hobbies. I totally recommend it. I do wish the little storage bag was a little more accommodating for the air bulb. Great bargain for less than $9!
customer_reviews.author: Spencey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Look, I wasn't expecting the same quality as a higher end cleaning kit so comparing to such would be apples to oranges. It's a cheap kit with the necessities that I need, however I expected the spray bottle for lens cleaning solution to actually contain some solution. It was empty. Perhaps I misread the description, or set my expectations too high, but I was expecting it to be full. Everything else is as advertised. It's fine as a kit overall, but now I have to go to the camera store and buy some lens cleaning solution when I could have gotten all at the store in one trip.
customer_reviews.author: sleepydad

customer_reviews.title: to help maintain a good working quality product
customer_reviews.text: The camera kit was a well received gift for a new "Shutter Bug" who enjoys taking pictures with his new Canon Camera. As with anything new, to help maintain a good working quality product, a cleaning kit such as yours is a must for any photographer. It seems complete with everything to maintain clear and constant pictures. I believe my nephew will enjoy his Canon for many years to come, with the help of accessories such as yours at a reasonable price. Thank you Mave
customer_reviews.author: Mave

customer_reviews.title: Must have item for your camera bag
customer_reviews.text: The kit worked great. I had a speck on my scensor for the past two years. We were just about to get a new one when I read about how to clean it. Read all the instructions and watched a couple of videos. Between the air blaster and the brush in the kit my camera was fixed up in about five minutes. The kit had everything I needed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gignac

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. I have never had a camera and this kit looked like it has everything I need to take care of my new camera. There are no directions on how to use each item. I'm also very confused why the bottle of solution is empty. What am I supposed to do with this empty bottle. On the photo of the kit it shows a label on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper is not always better
customer_reviews.text: The brushes in this kit are cheap and left hair all over my lens. I spent more time trying to remove the hairs this kit left behind then actually cleaning my lens. I am very disappointed in this kit. Now I have to purchase a better kit so I am out the money. Do yourself a favor spend a few more dollars and get a better kit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A.

customer_reviews.title: The kit is pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The kit is pretty good for the price. Plenty of microfiber cloths is great. When I first got the kit, it had a bad blower. The seller sent me a new kit that seems to have a better one. I would still consider it to be a cheap blower, but I would expect that with a cheap kit.
customer_reviews.author: MrFastZombie

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price. The air-blower is heavy duty rubber that won't crack. The sprayer is a nice mist. I fill it with 70% rubbing alcohol. The cloths are always good to have and are individually sealed in plastic. The brushes and carbon thing is as good as any, but I don't really use them. If you're going to complain about this kit, show us a better one. They all seem the same to me. It's useful for more than just cameras.
customer_reviews.author: ThatMouse

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst kit out there
customer_reviews.text: So overall I’m pretty satisfied. The bottle was empty, the pen is kind of cheap but the cloths are soft and the paper lenses cleaners are soft too. The blower works well also. But buy separate lense cleaning solution Incase you also get an empty bottle. And don’t only purchase this for the pen.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Missing pen
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the lens pen and it was the only thing missing....I overlooked that fact and was very displeased when my husband said it won't do and it wasn't the right thing so i gave it to my sister in law thinking she would appreciate it more.... today my husband showed me what it was he wanted and sure enough "that's the pen i bought that you said wasn't right" I told him..."i never saw it" he says. So I ask sis in law she says "nope wasn't one in the kit". So now what?
customer_reviews.author: diligant shopper

customer_reviews.title: Brush falling apart instantly
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm... So you want to design a brush that is supposed to take away dust and not leave anything behind? So you would think it might be a good idea to have it not fall apart? This is complete junk. Absolutely no thought onto the product quality. Just complete rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Watson26

customer_reviews.title: Foam came off cleaner, otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my Dad so he could clean his new camera and upon using the foam side of the pen, the foam part fell off. He was not applying heavy pressure or anything like that. Just cleaning the lens for the first time. Disappointed. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: WayfaringButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase overall. Quality is to be expected when the whole thing is like $9, but it all works well, and as long as you’re careful with it, it shouldn’t break on you. The dust blower is the main reason I bought it, but it also comes with a ton of “microfiber” (I’m not sure if they actually are but they work well) cloths too. Definitely get this to throw in your bag!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Poteat

customer_reviews.title: Directly into the trash can
customer_reviews.text: AVOID! Product is garbage. Items falling apart after the 1st use. Brush also had some sort of oil in the bristles and left filmy streaks on my lenses. Tip also fell off the cleaning pen and left scratch marks on the glass. I'm SO PISSED!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t the best cleaning kit. The lens pen was a bust. The cloths weren’t the best quality when it was time to actually clean my lens. When I cleaned my lens it made it more dirty than it was before. The only good thing in this kit was the dust blower. It definitely needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good, but arrived with missing tissue and one microfiber cloth
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived opened in the packaging and missing the lens tissue and one micro fiber cloth. The brush is super soft and it's easy to pull the hairs out. The pen is as described. It comes with an air blower and spray bottle. The plastic case bag feels sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for the lens cleaning basics.
customer_reviews.text: Blower & brushes do the job. The retractable pen cap seems a little too cheap at the opposite end of the brush but it works. Microfiber cloths are what you would expect. Worth the money to keep things clean without buying compressed air over and over. I use this with a Canon T2i and for dusting negatives off before scanning.
customer_reviews.author: andyrblank

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: I never write bad reviews, but This was an absolutely horrible lens cleaning kit. Cheaply made and I seriously worried it would scratch my lens, especially the extra cheap lens pen. Please look else where for a better set if you have good lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Atx 40cableAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give your photos the best chance to be great
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit has the tools a beginning, or maybe not so beginning photographer needs to help keep the photographic equipment properly maintained. The items seem to be made of reasonably good quality and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: jemorti

customer_reviews.title: Includes the necessary items to clean camera and lenses
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how to use the one double ended brush and pad in the black "lipstick like" case. The seller sent me instructions how to use. Lighter fluid or isopropyl alcohol work well as cleaners. If the air blower blew a a more forceful stream of air I would have given this a 5-star.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeylair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit
customer_reviews.text: Note that the sprayer bottle is empty as I expected but it's a great bargain and everything you need to keep your equipment clean. Just buy lens cleaner in bigger bottle and fill the included small spray bottle to put in your camera bag. The pen cleaner is nice with round and triangle tips for getting to hard to reach places like the view finder. The blower is perfect and I'm just not into one that looks like a rocket. The separate brush is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: pcaugh

customer_reviews.title: Keep it clean!
customer_reviews.text: This set contains all the essentials you need to keep your new camera factory clean. Seems simple but read the enclosed directions. If you mishandle the brush you can damage the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: GLJR

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cleaning kit for your lenses and camera but with that being said the polishing cloths Leave a film on your lenses but everything else in the kit is worth keeping in your bag definitely recommend for the price
customer_reviews.author: Chad sholly

customer_reviews.title: Bulb and brush are good
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use the carbon-tipped lens cleaner, personally, because I don't trust it. Everything else in this kit is worth it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Newman

customer_reviews.title: Pen falls apart
customer_reviews.text: The con I have with this product is that on the second use the foam on pen came off while cleaning my camera. Good thing I was not pressing down hard or it could have scratch the glass. What stinks is that it was my second time using that tip and it fell off. Had this product for less than 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ping

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this
customer_reviews.text: The vendor did promise a replacement kit. Issues that I had: 1- The Double ended pen & retractable brush was smashed. 2- The bottle was crushed. 3- The messed up plastic case was “patched” with clear packing tape. This indicates that this merchandise was knowingly sent out as defective. 4- The plastic tip on the “cleaning pen” disintegrated on the lens I was attempting to clean. It left a hard to clean, sticky plastic smudge on an expensive lens.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: no cleaning solution
customer_reviews.text: While it is clearly stated in the description, you should be aware that there is no cleaning solution in the spray bottle. It is delivered empty, which I did not realize at the time of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: mjipswich

customer_reviews.title: Camera Cleaning Kit Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned cameras all my life and own a whole bunch of them both digital and film. This is the first cleaning kit I've ever purchased and I'm thinking it was an excellent choice. When I opened the plastic bag I was surprised at all the different items inside. I would highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product as described and delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: The professional camera cleaning kit came well-packaged, intact, and as described. Also arrived early. Everything I need to clean my camera and lenses. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Old guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Kit
customer_reviews.text: Just about everything to need to keep your camera clean in one kit. I bought two. One to use at home and one to keep in my camera bag for when I am out and about. Dust and cameras do not get along well.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this kit has a bunch of different things in it and I only ordered it for the bulb. I figured I'd I got any use it of the rest of it, I'm golden. The pen with brush was so cheap it broke apart on first use! Everything else seems okay to use. I guess you get what you pay for sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: apeycup

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Though I do not use all of the products in this set regularly, some of them have been essential and have improved my ability to do photography on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Sssarah

customer_reviews.title: What the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: The tools necessary to clean stuff off my camera lenses. I took off one point as the plastic carrying case is almost worthless, cloth would be way better than stiff plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Feral

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera cleaning kit. Has everything you need to clean your camera. I love that it comes with several cloths for cleaning your lens
customer_reviews.author: T. Krzan

customer_reviews.title: Very good Cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the cleaning kit I received from you. It contains everything I will need to keep my camera clean and working well. When I go to order another, it will be from you!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: A nice kit except...
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning pen left a residue as I was attempting to clean my lens with it. Luckily it came off easily with the cloth and did not leave any scratches and I already own a pen that I can use instead. Otherwise this is a nice kit, just think about buying a different cleaning pen.
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT INCLUDE LENS CLEANER FLUID
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you add some lens cleaner fluid to your cart as this only includes the tiny spray bottle. Instructions would have been nice, but that's what Google is for.
customer_reviews.author: Mom'o4

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of photography for social media pages I am building. This was a great purchase at keeping my camera ready to go! Photo/video shoots are not cheap and I need to make sure that I bring my A game. This cleaning kit helps me do that!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very complete kit.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very complete kit and had everything you could possibly need to clean your camera lens and camera, inside and out. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Thomas

customer_reviews.title: with the blower brush I was able to easily blow it off
customer_reviews.text: I mostly got this kit because of the blower brush. I shoot a lot of scenic photos and I always seem to attract dust on my filters, with the blower brush I was able to easily blow it off. The lens cloths are great too. One of the days we went out to shoot waterfalls they helped keep the filters I was using dry. I haven't used the other things in the kit but they all look good. I would definitely buy this kit again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love how it’s packaged. Looking forward to using this to keep my Lenses and Camera Clean.
customer_reviews.author: Blackapino

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Camera Cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it was a great deal for what I paid. Lots of things to keep your camera very clean
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Withers

customer_reviews.title: Lens cloths are scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Wish I hadn’t purchased this. This is a super cheap kit and the lens cloths are terrible. You’d be in better shape using your shirt. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this kit to anyone
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Cheap chinese cleaning kit. The bristles on both brushing are falling out everywhere. The bottle doesnt come filled with anything any cleaning solution. There must be a big factory filled with these type of clothes somewhere because they give you one little one and 4 huge ones. Wouldn't recommend this kit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a professional course
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and no fuss. I didn’t know the little spray bottle was empty but I will research what to put inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good bag of tools to keep your camera/lenses etc cleaned up and dust free. Everything is good quality. An inexpensive set that does exactly what it's meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: Webberdean

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, comes with almost everything needed.
customer_reviews.text: This product includes almost everything that is needed to keep a camera and lens clean. Two things I didn't like, one was there wasn't a booklet explaining what everything was and the other is that it does not have cleaning fluid with it, only the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. The cleaning pen it comes with leaves glue residue all over your lens. It also comes with an EMPTY spray bottle....100% unsatisfied with this purchase. Please don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: It works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This product does a very good job cleaning electronic equipment, as well as film negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Watosh

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Hoping for camel 🐪 hair for the brush 🖌️ but for the price I should not complain. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Believer of Liberty

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this was perfect to help me clean my cameras it comes with everything you would need
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: DOESN'T INCLUDE ANY CLEANING SOLUTION, JUST A PUNCH OF CHEAP CLOTHS AND PLASTIC. EVERYTHING YOU ALREADY OWN LOL
customer_reviews.author: Can D. Eryigit

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used everything yet but everything in the description comes in the kit. Everything you'll need to clean your lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: This kit is inexpensive for a reason. First, it came with an empty bottle of lens cleaner. That was the deal breaker. Second, the items are packed into a cheap plastic ziplock type bag that won't last long. I don't recommend this kit. Spend a few more bucks and get something worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning products
customer_reviews.text: I keep this pack in my photography bag just in case I need to clean some lenses. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jean

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: not one thing in this entire kit is worth anything, the cloths are rough and the brushes fall apart , seriously please dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It's a good cleaning kit lens
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cleaning kit lens. It does the job. Give it a 4 star because the bag rips in less than a week. On the plus side it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: aris d...

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you'd need for basic cleaning of your lenses, or glasses, phone displays and more.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy lens cleaning solution separately, but otherwise came with plenty of tools to clean my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Roy

customer_reviews.title: Cant tell
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present so I'm not sure how good it is. Sorry its not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D. Gross

customer_reviews.title: A great add on
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the new camera. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: T B    Bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Feels like its not gonna last 1 week of use
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but its really cheap. Feels like its not gonna last 1 week of use :( --- UPDATE: so the conpany got in touch woth me after a 2atar rating and the above review. The have great cuatomer service and was given the same item again. This time the item was well built and did not seemed so flimsy. Could have been that i got a defective item on my first purchase. Really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: GeeSus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cleaning kit for my camera
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little cleaning kit for my camera. A must have for me. Great price and a quality product. I highly recommend it. Ron T
customer_reviews.author: R. Teel

customer_reviews.title: Brush tool needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The brush is too rough and the brush hair easy to shed. Can’t apply this brunch with my camera equipment with this quality :(
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my very first DLSR camera. Very nice kit!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Klenk

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: the air pump comes in dented. the brush falls apart and pieces of hair left on sensor. the bag is not friendly for reuse
customer_reviews.author: MyRebates

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and they loved it. Great kit formyour camera. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ohiocyndi

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Thr bruah bristles fall off and get stuck in lens.
customer_reviews.author: Georgyne A. Lalone

customer_reviews.title: Keep that lens clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great package with everything you need for caring of your camera, got to have it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: handy kit to buy if you have nice cameras. you never know when you will need to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hatem

customer_reviews.title: sorry this stuff is cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: I would not use on my camera equipment sent it back
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY N. THOMES

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: ok I arrived fast its all they say it is and from a commercial view its just wat I needed to clean my old Nikon and lens happy with service and product plane and simple that's all folks
customer_reviews.author: Edward L.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: After one time of use. The carbon tip on the pen tool came off and left a nasty smear on my lens. Don't buy this. Spend more money on a good kit.
customer_reviews.author: torpetey

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I knew that this would not be the greatest item when I purchased it. I just really wanted the cloths and the blower more than anything as I already have a real, and much better quality, lens pen. That being said, I am pleased with the items that did arrive, and they are very handy in my camera bag. Mostly I use the blower and the rags, but i also purchased a bottle of lens cleaner and I keep a small amount in the clear bottle that came with the package. I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Zappola

customer_reviews.title: Keep your gear clean without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little cheap but it works great. At this price I won't be terribly upset if I lose a peice or two while out and about. Great little set for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mouser

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit!!!! I keep it in my camera bag at all times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional DSLR Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Fits nicely into my camera bag. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: John Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good price....
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice professional quality camera care kit for a great price. Well worth every cent paid!
customer_reviews.author: Model A

customer_reviews.title: What else?
customer_reviews.text: I think this kit is about as complete as you could wish for! Quick service, as advertised, and going with me and my camera to the Namib Desert in Africa! Should work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great package for lens kit
customer_reviews.text: Great package it gives all the tools to clean the lens off Haven’t used it but I’m pretty sure this be very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Ilya

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a nice amount of tools and clothes to clean your camera and camera lens
customer_reviews.author: Dawson G.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sony digital SLR and noticed there was a black mark on my photos taken recently, after looking in to it, found out it was probably dust on sensor. I put the camera through it's self cleaning a few times, but no luck, so I looked online, got this kit, cleaned it today, and bam, no more black mark on photos! This kit is perfect, seems very well made and saved me a ton to have it cleaned for me!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a returning middle aged shooter who was looking for a good cleaning kit for a good price. This one fits the bill nicely. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, Great price. Everything in the kit is quality. This kit very affordable for both the beginner and experienced photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu12

customer_reviews.title: Beware...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my DSLR camera, clean my lenses and was taking the camera to Alaska. I cleaned everything, except for one hair, that made its way on my mirror. Did not notice until after the first 100 pictures. I went back to the brush and I brushed my hand and more hair fell off. So, binding on hair is fair at best.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my two kids who have taken an interest in photography as a Christmas present. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: James P. Church

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to clean and protect your camera and lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Missing cleaning fluid
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today, and the lens cleaning pen looks like the best part of the kit. There was no actual cleaning fluid in the cleaning fluid container.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fit my needs
customer_reviews.text: Compact kit, had all I needed. have purchased 2 one for myself and one for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Malamute

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product. Now of course you get what pay for but even so it was not worth a dime. Cleaning cloths are very "dusty" and left residue on the lenses, the pen.. Sigh.. well, read the other reviews!! Their statement of leaving glue like smears on your lense are true.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy!
customer_reviews.text: Any camera user would love this! This came very fast and it was in great condition! Works wonders on my camera when I clean it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wrapped well and the product is as expected. Everything seems to be great quality
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my camera clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to carry in my camera case
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Reader

customer_reviews.title: but it was easily removable.
customer_reviews.text: The product came as described and nothing was broken. It works well, especially for the price and so far I'm not having any problems that the 1 star reviews are describing. The only issues were the the bag has a small (unnoticeable unless looking for it) tear on the side seam and the blower had a little excess plastic, but it was easily removable.
customer_reviews.author: notachance

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but you get what you pay for I suppose. I would of liked a better holding bag for it all.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Only using the air blower so far I love it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Affan

product_meta.title: Professional Camera Cleaning Kit for DSLR Cameras- Canon, Nikon, Pentax, Sony - Cleaning Tools and Accessories …
product_meta.description: Keep your DSLR Clean and Prolong the Life of Your Equipment Every Photographer Knows the Importance of Keeping Your Camera in Pristine Condition Our cleaning kit provides all the tools you need to maintain your precious camera equipment. All the tools included are useful and compact to allow you to easily carry them in your camera bag.Contents:1x Double sided Lens Cleaning Pen: One Side is dust removal brush and other side is a special non-liquid cleaning element, designed to never dry out.1x Empty Reusable Fluid Spray Bottle: Fill with water or your favorite cleaning solution.1x Air Blower: Direct a powerful stream of air to blow away dirt.1x Lens Brush: Perfect for cleaning all optical items.4 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloths(Color random): For convenient in-the-field cleaning. Compatible with: Most DSLR cameras. CamKix If for any reason you are unhappy with any product by CamKix, please do not hesitate to contact us. We take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products and will do our very best to solve your problem quickly and efficiently! CamKix -USPTO# 86127507- is a registered trademark protected by US Trademark Law. CamKix products are sold by authorized sellers only.
feature_bullets: Great tools for keeping your camera clean and in pristine condition.
Double sided lens cleaning pen features a dust removal brush on one side and a special non-liquid cleaning element on the other side which is designed to never dry out.
Reusable spray bottle arrives empty, simply fill it with your favourite cleaning solution.
Air blower is perfect for cleaning delicate lenses and camera elements.
With Camkix retail packaging and one year guarantee.
